Headline: Update: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at Jeffery/71st
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump, 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island and 75th due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump, #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island and 75th, due to street blockage near Jeffery/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 130th/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 34 S Michigan buses temp. rerouted NB Ellis, 133rd, 133rd pl, Langley, 131st, Vernon, 134th, Indiana, 130th; SB 130th, Indiana, 134th, 133rd pl, Langley, 131st

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 130th/Eberhart, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Ellis, 133rd st, 133rd pl, Langley, 131st, Vernon, 134th, Indiana, and 130th.

Southbound buses will operate via 130th, Indiana, 134th, 133rd pl, Langley, and 131st.

Allow extra travel time.
